sample_2.title: Split PDF document into multiple files
sample_2.content_1: Divide a document into multiple files with the [Split Document](https://docs.groupdocs.com/merger/java/split-document/) feature to simplify the process of managing and extracting specific sections or pages from large documents.
sample_2.content_2: It allows you to divide documents into smaller parts based on various criteria - by page range, by start/end pages, by odd/even page numbers etc.
